collidascope

Interface ICollider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Enemy, Friend, GameObject

    public interface ICollider
    Interface for objects which support the notion of colliding with another collider.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 5/22/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Shape getBoundingShape()
      Returns the bounding shape used for collision detection.
      String getCollisionKey()
      Returns the collision key used to create the map key for the collision detection and handler functionality.
      Map<String,BiFunction<ICollider,ICollider,Boolean>> getDetectors()
      Returns the detectors functions for the collider.
      Map<String,BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> getHandlers()
      Returns the handler functions for the collider.

    • Method Detail

      • getCollisionKey

        String getCollisionKey()
        Returns the collision key used to create the map key for the collision detection and handler functionality.
        Returns:
        The collision key.

        Returns the bounding shape used for collision detection.
        Returns:

        Returns the handler functions for the collider.
        Returns:
        The handlers.

      • getDetectors

        Map<String,BiFunction<ICollider,ICollider,Boolean>> getDetectors()
        Returns the detectors functions for the collider.
        Returns:
        The detectors.
